meanings.definition: A philosophical theory or approach that emphasizes the existence of the individual person as a free and responsible agent determining their own development through acts of the will.
meanings.sent1: In existentialism, individuals are seen as free agents responsible for their own choices.
meanings.sent2: Many students study existentialism in philosophy classes.
meanings.sent3: The existentialism of the cat deciding to nap in the sun was evident.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to quit her job was an act of existentialism.
meanings.sent5: The concept of existentialism can be empowering for some people.
